title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When I remove a working set, the package view immediately filters the packages. However, in my opinion, the filtering should only happen when I close the working set selection dialog, not while I am still manipulating the working set. Additionally, I believe that pressing 'cancel' should revert all changes made to the working sets, including canceling the removal.
OB: When I remove a working set, the package view immediately filters the packages.
EB: The package view should only refilter when the working set selection dialog is closed, not during manipulation. Pressing 'cancel' should revert all changes made to the working sets, including canceling the removal.
SR:
1. Open the working set selection dialog.
2. Remove a working set.
3. Observe that the package view immediately filters the packages.
4. Cancel the removal and observe that the working set is restored.
